examples.example: 我梦想有一间属于自己的温馨小屋。

translate.english: I dream of having a warm little house of my own.

examples.example: 我期待拥有一间摆满了书籍的书房。

translate.english: I look forward to having a study filled with books.

examples.example: 我希望未来能拥有一间充满阳光的花房。

translate.english: I hope to have a sunny greenhouse in the future.
